website_summaries.verdict: A durable, accurate tire gauge that's built for large tires such as those found on professional  and heavy duty trucking, recreational, and hauling vehicles.
pros: Features dual heads that are suitable for larger tires
Ideal for heavy-duty use, as it has a solid build and is highly accurate
cons: Not ideal for average passenger cars

customer_reviews.title: Manly-man's pressure gauge
customer_reviews.text: What do you do when your wife and kids take your air pressure gauges? Buy a monster they can't put in the compact car glove box! These are professional grade gauges, beefy, accurate, with a snap ring so you can hand it in the shop or on your belt to show off. Can handle minor prybar applications! Two pressure heads, useful as I'm guaranteed to stop with the wheels under the fenders. Standard heads (not EU). No air release button - those are for amateurs, anyway. Can support weight of most cars when rolled over (oops). All kidding aside, very high quality, long lived air pressure gauge. I bought two, as our dog is the only family member without one
customer_reviews.author: ChuckTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for duallys on Class A Motorhome
customer_reviews.text: The gauge has all of the attributes you need to check the tires on large vehicles. It is long, the head is narrow, and the gauge goes to 160 PSI. All of my other tire gauges either could not go to the 100 PSI I needed, or the head was too large or at the wrong angle to reach into the valve step. The gauge matched the reading from the tire shop when I got new tires. I have now used this multiple times to check the air pressure on my RV and very happy with it. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: CalifGuy

customer_reviews.title: Fits my wheels (another brand did not)
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work well, but the larger issue is that it fits my dually wheels. I recently bought a different brand where the angles on the two heads were different (specifically, one of the heads was straight (in line with the shaft of the guage), and the other was at an angle. The straight in-line head would not work with the valves on the inside of the dually - the wheel frame interfered. This pressure tester, however, fit fine - where both the inward facing and outward facing heads are NOT in line with the shaft of the gauge.
customer_reviews.author: SteveO

customer_reviews.title: Big, heavy, solid build
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lose this one! It's big and bulky. A sturdy tool. Just what you need for truck wheels. Inside duals are easy to reach. The attachment ring is a nice addition that is actually useful to hang up the tool in the shop or in the truck. Thought it was a gimmick but I use it all the time. Keeps the ends clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tulloch, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the one that I lost that I purchased from NAPA 20 years ago. The new one appears to be exactly the same as the one I lost. Works well on both duals and single wheel and appears to be equally accurate at low PSI and well as high (large truck tires at 110lbs!). Recommended to anyone who has duals or needs a durable pressure gauge that can read higher pressures.
customer_reviews.author: soundsorcerer

customer_reviews.title: Big and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a cheap crappy pressure gauge snapped in half while I was using it. This one looks indestructible! Much bigger than I expected but nicely ergonomic. Works perfectly. Looks like it should cost 3 or 4 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: tahoedawg

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for checking pressure on my Dually. Good price, quality and accuracy. Checked it against a calibrated gauge at work, + or - 1 lbs based on my test.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good product to recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very good gage, works well on my Ram 3500 dally...i recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick889764

customer_reviews.title: Seems substantial
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to have in my car to replace one I've misplaced. I haven't used it yet so can't speak to accuracy but it seems to be substantial and well made.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dually! Heavy design and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great product Wonderful service. It is a heavy and solid design.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Welch

customer_reviews.title: Quality Made
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well made and heavy duty. Bought for use with a one ton truck towing a 5th wheel. Time will tell but so far I would recommend this above the cheaper gauges.
customer_reviews.author: PGA

customer_reviews.title: Huge, and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Huge, and accurate. Easily reaches my one ton dually rear inner tire. This is the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: nictoanamide

customer_reviews.title: a lot bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be the size of the ones one usually sees, but it is huge. I feel like I should own a tire shop when I use it. It works great, though.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena P.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and strong, doesn’t feel cheap or like I could break it, like most tire gauges do feel like now a days.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works well and gives me the extra reach for truck tires.
customer_reviews.author: Margret Braun

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first tire pressure gauges when I was 20 years old and had my first business which was an Auto body shop in 1960. Over the years I have owned many and now I am 78 and the two turned up missing in my garage I suspect one of my grandchildren but this new dual head gauge works perfectly on my car my lawn mower my snow blower.
customer_reviews.author: James  Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Big, heavy, durable. So far it is working great.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! Big, heavy, durable. So far it is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Zootal

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: what else is there to say? It's a gauge and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: Accuracies
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and seems to read the same as the tpms in my one car, I have two other vehicles without a tpms system so I measure against the electronic system to see if either varies a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley A Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not for dual tires
customer_reviews.text: The gauge works good but was not built for checking dual tires. If you are checking tires on a pickup, this will work fine. If checking pressure on dual tires, get something with a straight foot. It’s hard to check the inside tire with a straight valve stem with an angled foot when space is limited.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat it
customer_reviews.text: Best deal for especially if you have a dually or tractor trailer this is it!!!! Buy it you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.author: Housewife1028

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart right out of the box! Totaly useless!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. The head came apart almost the first day. It's not even useable. You might get lucky and get a good one. Mine however was junk..out of the box.don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Nunez

product_meta.title: WYNNsky Extension Heavy Duty Dual Head Service Tire Pressure Gauge, Durable Auto Service Pressure Gauge
feature_bullets: Designed for heavy duty use required at the service level, Pressure measurement is accurate and reliable
Ideal for dual wheels and other difficult-to-reach valves, Intuitively read
Service Gauge dual head chuck Measures 12 3/4" length, 10 PSI to 160 PSI, 2 lb increments 120 to 1020 kPa in 20 kPa increments

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars464 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
